trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when a method attempts to construct a culture that is not available.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message to display with this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message to display with this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that is the cause of the current exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message to display with this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message to display with this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Culture Name that cannot be found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxx Xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

The name of the parameter that is the cause the current exception.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Culture Name that cannot be found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxx Xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

\n

The error message to display with this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the culture name that cannot be found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the error message that explains the reason for the exception.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A text string describing the details of the exception.

\n
